physical_appearance: "The image shows the front cover of a magazine. There is a line of Chinese characters present at the top, and several more at the bottom. Both of them are getting married and they are wearing wedding outfits. The lady holds a bouquet of red and violet flowers in her arms."
sgcool_label_text: This entertainment weekly was  published by the Singapore Broadcasting Corporation (now known as Mediacorp) in the 1980s and 1990s. It provided the local Chinese readers the local and regional entertainment news and television programme schedules.  The cover of each issue features  celebrities from the entertainment scene. This issue has Huang Peiru and Chen Shucheng on the cover
creator_1: Singapore Broadcasting Corporation Singapore Broadcasting Corporation (TTE)
subject_terms_2: Periodicals Celebrities Actors Chen, Shucheng, 1949- Celebrity weddings
